name: Thorakites

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: This Stand adds +1 to its Defense Characteristic against Attacks originating from its front arc.

specialRules.name: Vanguard (3)
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free March Action during its Activation with a maximum March Distance of 3".

specialRules.name: Take Cover
specialRules.description: When this Regiment becomes the Target of an Enemy Regiment's Volley Action it gains the Tenacious (2) Special Rule until the end of that Action.

specialRules.name: Change Flanks!
specialRules.description: When the Regiment Activates from the Strategic Stack it gains the Fluid Formation Special Rule until the end of the Round.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

officerUpgrades: Any Thorakites Regiment may take up to one Officer: Andromachos (25 points), Lochagos (15 points)

name: Hoplites

specialRules.name: Phalanx
specialRules.description: This Regiment counts its Defense and Resolve Characteristics as 1 point higher against all Hits originating from its front Arc.

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: This Stand adds +1 to its Defense Characteristic against Attacks originating from its front arc.

specialRules.name: Support (2)
specialRules.description: Unengaged Stands in this Regiment inflict 2 Attacks as support.

specialRules.name: Hold!
specialRules.description: While another Friendly Regiment is in contact with the same Enemy Regiment as this Regiment it gains the Opportunists Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

officerUpgrades: Any Hoplite Regiment may take up to one Officer: Dorilates (15 points), Lochagos (15 points)

specialRules.name: Barrage (4) (16", Arcing Fire)
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making a number of Attack rolls equal to its Barrage value multiplied by the Regiment's number of Stands.

specialRules.name: Loose Formation
specialRules.description: When a Stand performs a Volley Action against a Regiment with this Special Rule it halves the X value in its Barrage (X) Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

name: Phalangites

specialRules.name: Phalanx
specialRules.description: This Regiment counts its Defense and Resolve Characteristics as 1 point higher against all Hits originating from its front Arc.

specialRules.name: Pike Formation
specialRules.description: Enemy Regiments suffer -3 to their Impact (X) Special Rule when in contact with this Regiment's front arc.

specialRules.name: Support (3)
specialRules.description: Unengaged Stands in this Regiment inflict 3 Attacks as support.

specialRules.name: Wall of Pikes
specialRules.description: When the Regiment Activates from the Strategic Stack it gains the Aura of Death (6) Special Rule until the end of the Round.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

officerUpgrades: Any Phalangites Regiment may take up to one Officer: Dorilates (15 points), Lochagos (15 points)

name: Agema

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: This Stand adds +1 to its Defense Characteristic against Attacks originating from its front arc.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 1 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Fluid Formation
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free additional Reform Action during its Activation.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

officerUpgrades: Any Agema Regiment may take up to one Officer: Andromachos (25 points)

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: This Stand adds +1 to its Defense Characteristic against Attacks originating from its front arc.

specialRules.name: Fluid Formation
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free additional Reform Action during its Activation.

specialRules.name: Impact (2)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Opportunists
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free March Action during its Activation.

specialRules.name: Vanguard (6)
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free March Action during its Activation with a maximum March Distance of 6".

specialRules.name: Pathfinders
specialRules.description: A Reinforcement Line set by this Regiment cannot be pushed back by Enemy Regiments.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Devout
specialRules.description: This Regiment may be the Target of a Friendly [Character] Stand's Spellcasting Action regardless of the Spell's Range.

specialRules.description: This model may cast spells with 5 dice.

specialRules.description: This Model does not suffer the effects of Aura of Death (X) and Decay (X) Special Rules.

specialRules.name: Blood of the Forge God
specialRules.description: Friendly Spellcasters with the Priest (X) Special Rules, currently within 10" of this Regiment gain the Priest (+1) Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Barrage (7) (12", Armor Piercing (1), Torrential Fire)
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making a number of Attack rolls equal to its Barrage value. The Barrage has Armor Piercing (1) and Torrential Fire special rules.

specialRules.name: Weapon Platform
specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment count their Flank Arcs as their Front Arc for the purposes of determining Line of Sight.

specialRules.name: Deadshots
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule always counts as under the effects of the Aimed Shot Special Rule.

specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free March Action during its Activation with a maximum March Distance of 4".

specialRules.name: Exploit Flanks
specialRules.description: Enemy Regiments that become the Target of this Regiment's Volley Action within its Effective Range, Re-Roll successful Defense Rolls of "1", should the shots originate from their Flank or Rear Arc.

drawEvents.name: Fire and Advance
drawEvents.description: If this Regiment performs a Volley Action as its second Action during this Activation, it may take a free additional March Action immediately after the Volley Action is resolved.

specialRules.description: This Regiment's Effective Range is equal to the Regiment's Barrage Range.

specialRules.name: Combat Directives
specialRules.description: At the end of each Round's Supremacy Phase this Character Stand selects a Combat Directive that will last until the end of the Round.

specialRules.description: This model may cast spells with 5 dice.

specialRules.description: The Regiment this Character Stand is currently attached to gains the Unstoppable Special Rule.

specialRules.description: This Character Stand's Warband may not contain more than three Regiments of Companion Cavalry.

specialRules.name: Seizing a New Future
specialRules.description: All Friendly [Titan] Regiments in the Army gain the Fearless Special Rule while within range of an Objective Zone.

specialRules.name: Ancient Tactician
specialRules.description: Friendly [Titan] Regiments Charging through a piece of Hindering Terrain, can benefit from the Inspired Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Lord of Titans
specialRules.description: A Promethean Oracle is considered to be a Regiment by itself in addition to it also being a Character Stand.
